articles.title: TikTok ban: all the news on the appâ€™s shutdown and return in the US
articles.description: After briefly going dark in the US to comply with the divest-or-ban law targeting ByteDance that went into effect on January 19th, TikTok quickly came back online. It eventually reappeared in the App Store and Google Play as negotiations between the US and China continued, and Donald Trump continued to sign extensions directing officials not […]
articles.author: Verge Staff
